JobFullDesc: About The Team: Uber's Commerce Gateway engineering team is responsible for supporting our lines business across Uber and enhancing the infrastructure for orders and payments. All commerce in and out of Uber flows through the commerce mission-critical systems. In 2019 this meant processing over 6.9 billion trips with $65 billion in gross bookings. With strict 4 9’s availability requirements. Commerce systems are some of our largest scalable systems and the complex day-to-day interactions require careful coordination from engineers that have a deep sense of quality, security, and ingenuity. About the Role As a backend engineer on the Commerce Gateway team, you’ll be writing reliable and maintainable code that teams across the company rely on while collaborating extensively with those teams to anticipate platform features required to enable them to launch new and innovative products.  What the Candidate Will Do :Responsible for delivery of high quality features that address business needs at very high scale.Collaborate closely with stakeholders, product, and other engineering teams.Test, monitor and safely deploy features.Basic Qualifications:At least two (2) years of software engineering experienceBachelor of Science (BS) in Computer Science, Physics, or Mathematics, or related fieldExperience coding with Go, Java, Python, or C++Strong problem solving and coding skillsExperience with developing, debugging, and shipping software products on large code bases that span platforms and toolsExperience with Software Development processes such as design, planning, implementation, maintenance & documentationDemonstrated experience working collaboratively in cross-functional teamsPassion for learning new technologies, domains, and challenging the status quo.Grit, drive and a strong feeling of ownership coupled with collaboration.Preferred Qualifications:Experience with production-quality services, deployment, monitoring, and reliability.Ability to decompose complex business problems into clean, extensible, performant services and systems.Self driven to identify opportunities to make things better and efficient.Customer focus and a drive to support different businesses at a platform level.BONUS:Experience with distributed storage and database systems (SQL or NoSQL, e.g. MySQL, Cassandra).Background with payment systems or financial technology.Experience with building high performance, scalable distributed systems using technologies like Kafka, Hadoop, Hive, or Zookeeper
